attributes.action: Get the government to stop singling out working class on the cost of living help
attributes.additional_details: As a person on Minimum wage I find it hard to cope with the cost of the ever increasing cost of living and the government help everyone but the working class
attributes.background: Make the cost of living help available to everyone not just the poorest,disabled or the old

rejection.details:
We can see that you're concerned about the rising costs of living for many people, but it's not clear what exactly you'd like the Government to do. Petitions have to set out a clear and specific action for the Government to take on. 

You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action:

Take urgent actions to address the extreme cost of living crisis
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612439
